record.title: PARLIAMENTARY INQUIRY
record.narrative:
PARLIAMENTARY INQUIRY -- (House of Representatives - July 11, 2007)

[Page: H7568]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I have a parliamentary inquiry.

record.chair: The gentleman from Florida is recognized.

speaking.paragraph: Am I correct that the first two suspensions have been addressed and the third is scheduled for now and House Resolution 287 is the fourth?

record.chair: The gentleman will want to consult with leadership on the schedule.
